mapper.update: update sys_resource set parent_ids = REPLACE(parent_ids, #{oldParentIds}, #{parentIds}) where parent_ids like CONCAT( '%,' , #{id} , ',%' )
mapper.delete: delete from sys_resource where FIND_IN_SET(#{id},parent_ids) or id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(1) from sys_role_resource where resource_id = #{resourceId}
select max(t1.code) code,max(t1.pos) pos from sys_resource t1 where t1.pos = (select max(t2.pos) from sys_resource t2)

SELECT res.id,res.code,res.pos,res.url,res.type,res.parent_id, res.parent_ids,res.name,res.icon,res.sort FROM sys_resource res LEFT JOIN sys_role_resource srr ON res.id=srr.resource_id LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.id=srr.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON sr.id=ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id=#{userId} AND res.del_flag=0 AND res.status=0

select sr.id,sr.code,sr.description,sr.icon,sr.name,sr.sort,sr.common,sr.pos, sr.status,sr.type,sr.url,srp.name pname,srp.id pid from sys_resource sr left join sys_resource srp ON sr.parent_id=srp.id
sr.name like concat( '%' , #{name} , '%' )
FIND_IN_SET(#{id},sr.parent_ids) or sr.id = #{id}
ORDER BY sr.update_date desc
